section.name: RETS Server Compliance Checker
section.p:
The RETS Server Compliance Checker is the NAR's official certification tool used to test RETS Servers for compliance to both the 1.0 and 1.5 versions of the RETS Specification. The compliance checker contains test scripts for the following 1.0 and 1.5 RETS transactions:
Login
Logout
ChangePassword
Action
GetMetadata
Search
Update
GetObject

section.name: Technical Notes
section.p: The RETS Server Compliance Checker is a desktop application written in Java using Swing as its GUI. It uses the RETS Reference Implementation Java RETS API to connect to RETS Servers. All scripts are written in XML and are parameter-driven. Test Evaluators are Java classes. All scripts and test evaluators are easily extensible and customizable. The compliance checker application is designed to run on both Windows and Unix platforms.
